description: This table contains hospital account notes information from the Notes (HNO) master file. The table includes information about guarantor, patient, hospital account, and hospital liability bucket the note is associated with.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the note record associated with a hospital account.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account for which the account note was entered.

columns.name: GUARANTOR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor associated with the hospital account. Currently the guarantor ID is not populated in HNO 500 for hospital account notes, so this column will never return data.

columns.name: NOTE_ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who entered an account note associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: NOTE_ENTRY_DT_TIME
columns.description: The date and time an account note was entered for a hospital account.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: Hospital Liability Bucket linked to this note

columns.name: HNO_RECORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Record type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PB Guarantor Note


PB Guarantor Letter


PB Insurance Follow-up Letter


PB Hospital Account Note


HB Guarantor Note


HB Hospital Account Note


HB Guarantor Letter


HB Hospital Account Letter
